name: Typescript
description: Typescript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

name: ReactJS
description: ReactJS is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

name: AngularJs(1x)
description: AngularJs(1x) is a structural framework for dynamic web apps

name: Apollo Client
description: Client is is a comprehensive state management library for JavaScript that enables you to manage both local and remote data with GraphQL.

name: Redux
description: Redux is a Predictable State Container for JS Apps

name: Material UI
description: UI is a framework that provides a robust, customizable, and accessible library of foundational and advanced components, enabling you to build your own design system and develop React applications faster.

name: Axios
description: Axios is a simple promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js. Axios provides a simple to use library in a small package with a very extensible interface.

name: Formik
description: Formik is a lib for build forms in React, without the tears

name: Lodash
description: Lodash is a modern JavaScript utility library delivering modularity, performance & extras.

name: Ramda
description: Ramda is a practical functional library for JavaScript programmers.

name: React Router
description: React Router is a lib to create navigation in react apps

name: React Helmet
description: React Helmet will manage all of your changes to the document head. Helmet takes plain HTML tags and outputs plain HTML tags. It's dead simple, and React beginner friendly.

name: Yup
description: Yup is a JavaScript schema builder for value parsing and validation. Define a schema, transform a value to match, validate the shape of an existing value, or both

name: Redux Toolkit
description: Toolkit is the official, opinionated, batteries-included toolset for efficient Redux development

name: React Intl
description: React Intl is a lib to management web app internacionalization.

name: React Scripts
description: Scripts is a lib for common actions to run react applications that use create-react-app.

name: Pretier
description: Pretier is code format to any languages and frameworks.

name: ESLint
description: ESLint is a lib that statically analyzes your code to quickly find problems, and fix automatically.

name: Stylelint
description: Stylelint is a mighty, modern linter that helps you avoid errors and enforce conventions in your styles.

name: Semantic Release
description: Semantic Release automates the whole package release workflow including: determining the next version number, generating the release notes, and publishing the package.

name: Dotenv cli
description: cli is a client terminal interface to use env vars in .env files.

name: Graphql codegen
description: codegen is a client to generate code from your GraphQL schema and operations with a simple CLI

name: Jest
description: Jest is a delightful JavaScript Testing Framework with a focus on simplicity

name: Testing library
description: Testing library is a simple and complete testing utilities that encourage good testing practices

name: Enzyme
description: Enzyme is a JavaScript Testing utility for React that makes it easier to test your React Components' output. You can also manipulate, traverse, and in some ways simulate runtime given the output.
